name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby>バクハカイザー

requirement.en: Send 1 Wyrm Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Shuffle up to 3 cards from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if you sent a Level 8 or higher monster to the Graveyard to meet the requirement, this card gains ATK equal to [the number of cards shuffled by this effect] x 300 until the end of this turn.

materials.en: "Demolition Soldier Hell Met" + 1 Wyrm Type monster
